user_prompt: Teknoloji sektöründeki proje yöneticileri için, 5+ yıl deneyimli, ileri düzey bir 'Liderlik Gelişim Programı' tasarla. Program 5 aylık bir sürece yayılan, içinde 5 günlük yoğunlaştırılmış bir bölüm içeren karma bir yapıda olmalı.
title: Leadership Development Program (LDP) for Tech Leaders
target_audience: Senior project managers and program managers in the technology sector with over 5 years of management experience.

learning_objectives.text: Increase self-awareness and emotional intelligence in high-pressure tech environments
Develop skills to accelerate agile team achievement and foster psychological safety
Build capacity to operate effectively within complex matrix organizations
Learn to identify strategic opportunities in technical challenges and create systemic solutions
Create and communicate a compelling product and team vision to diverse stakeholders

content_structure.description: Online coursework on tech leadership trends, 360-degree feedback assessments, and initial self-reflection.
In-person sessions covering self-awareness, agile team dynamics, systems thinking, technical problem-solving, and vision setting.
Executive coaching, peer network collaboration on a real-world project, and capstone presentation.

training_modules.title: Module 1: The Self-Aware Tech Leader

slides.title: Introduction to Behavioral Assessments
slides.content: Exploring tools like DiSC and MBTI for self-reflection in a technical context.

slides.title: Navigating Matrix Organizations
slides.content: Understanding systems thinking and stakeholder mapping in tech companies.

activities.title: 360-Degree Feedback Debrief
activities.description: Participants partner up to discuss their feedback results and identify key development areas for leading technical teams.

assessments.question: Case study: A critical project is delayed due to inter-departmental conflict. How would you apply systems thinking to resolve it?

interactive_elements: VR simulation of a difficult stakeholder meeting

reinforcement_plan.activity: Peer accountability check-in on action plan progress via Slack channel.
AI-driven adaptive quiz on agile leadership principles.

selection_rationale: Exemplary program for its comprehensive structure, alignment with Bloom's taxonomy, and strong reinforcement plan tailored for the tech industry.
